Articles.Content:
Made this in about three hours using 3Ds max, would've been two if my PSU hadn't died on me without me saving in ages. (Replacing it was surprisingly quick)

With a B9 Aerospace shuttle incase you want something in the foreground for a screensaver. (Awesome mod!)

And for those of you wondering how I got the textures, I used Ninja Ripper, the models weren't so important because spheres are not exactly the most complicated things ever. ;P

Let me know if you've any ideas for improvement!

Edited April 22, 2013 by Chant778

Steps of seeing this picture.

1. Mind=blown

2. Think it is super super super*five pages of super later* super great.

3. Notice the Mun is normal texture.

4. Get sad because Mun is left out.

4. Get sad because Mun is left out.

Don't get me wrong, I love the Mun, just working on better textures right now, this is kind of a WIP.... Soon it will be complete.
Can't wait for it to be completed, looks amazing as it is.

My computer choked on seeing this- ah well though, maybe optimization will rescue us from a third art pass.

Awesome work! Can't wait to see the finished version!
Chant... Codoro maybe? Well anyways this is amazing compared to some of your other works I've seen
Awesome work! But I think the lighting on the shuttle could use some more work. It's very sharp.
Put the camera away, and increase FOV. Rework the mun texture, brighten the image, maybe a little bit of work in the Kerbin's atmosphere. I don't like the spaceship that much on the second picture.
I hope squad hires you so that every time i'm busy crashing into kerbin i can think: "damn, thats a nice planet"

I hope squad hires you so that every time i'm busy crashing into kerbin i can think: "damn, thats a nice planet"

"Look at all those clouds, they're all fluffy and nice and stuff"
10,000 hours in GIMP to bring you this realistic Mun.

10,000 hours in GIMP to bring you this realistic Mun.

Just as I began work on it.

Great job!

Put the camera away, and increase FOV. Rework the mun texture, brighten the image, maybe a little bit of work in the Kerbin's atmosphere. I don't like the spaceship that much on the second picture.

http://i.imgur.com/y60kne3.jpg This a bit better?

Chant... Codoro maybe? Well anyways this is amazing compared to some of your other works I've seen

Thanks.

How did you happen upon this post?
Nice update. Looks even better.

Thanks.

How did you happen upon this post?

Im a very active member on the forums, And I started playing roblox again and saw Codoro on my group page

"Look at all those clouds, they're all fluffy and nice and stuff"

Squad has posted an upcoming feature list, clouds are on it!
I dont know how you did it, but if it was me, i will use just a earth photo of the africa side and start to modify from there.

Used the texture of Kerbin from the main menu, made it super hi-res and patched it using parts of Blue Marble, I would upload the texture, but it's 12 MB and still a WIP.

Here's a scaled down version (From 8096 x 4048) Feel free to use it if ya want. http://i.imgur.com/bFnsbkv.jpg
Would any of images form my mapping project help you? See my sig. (I have both shaded and unshaded ones of Kerbin, Mun, and Minmus)
That's incredible! How did you get the textures?

That's incredible! How did you get the textures?

It's pretty easy to rip stuff from the game.

I ripped a whole Kerbal once!

http://i.imgur.com/y60kne3.jpg This a bit better?

Arf, so Decrease the FOV and brighten the image.

Keep on going

Did you say you did that in GIMP? Teach me Master!!

Are there any Gimp tutorials that focus on KSP pictures?

Did you say you did that in GIMP? Teach me Master!!

The original image was done in 3Ds Max, but somebody shaded the moon in Gimp.
